definition[0]: to make short sounds or say a few words in a rough voice, when you do not want to talk
example[0]: He just grunted and carried on reading his book.
definition[1]: if a person or animal grunts, they make short low sounds in their throat
example[1]: Grunting with effort, she lifted me up.
definition[2]: a short low sound that a person or animal makes in their throat
example[2]: Chris gave a grunt and went back to sleep.
definition[3]: someone who does hard physical work for low pay
